architectural_resources: Container image (built/published to ghcr.io via GitHub Actions: .github/workflows/docker-publish.yml)
Kubernetes CronJob workload (implied by README: "kubernetes cronjob"; manifests/terraform not present in this repo snapshot)
MySQL/MariaDB database to back up (entrypoint.sh uses `mysqldump` against DB_HOST; dumps `nextcloud` and `mysql` databases)
FTP server as backup target (entrypoint.sh uses rclone FTP remote with FTP_HOST/FTP_USER/FTP_PASS)
Nextcloud instance filesystem (expects Nextcloud directory structure and edits `config/config.php` maintenance flag)
